concept.title: Configuring 's content completion to present @outputclass values

conbody.p: To configure 's content completion, it is necessary to copy and paste the match elements contained in the cc_config_miramo.xml file supplied with the to the DITA framework you are using, usually located in [OXYGEN_INSTALL_DIR]/frameworks/dita/resources/cc_config.xml.
The cc_config_miramo.xml file is located here:
conbody.codeblock: <match elementName="p" attributeName="outputclass"> <items action="append"> <item value="mmpdf:span" annotation="Spans title across all columns in multi-column document"/> <item value="mmpdf:pageBreak" annotation="breaks page before title/p/note paragraph"/> <item value="mmpdf:columnBreak" annotation="force title/p/note paragraph to top of next column (or page, for singlecolumn documents)"/> <item value="mmpdf:section:name" annotation="start new section using SectionDef 'name'. SectionDef is defined in the MFD template"/> </items> </match>
conbody.p: The <match> entries for allowing content completion for the MiramoPDF @outputclass values.

Open the cc_config_miramo.xml and copy and paste the entries inside the <config> root element to the beginning of the DITA framework cc_config.xml file located in [OXYGEN_INSTALL_DIR]/frameworks/dita/resources/cc_config.xmlIt may be necessary to repeat this process when the is upgraded if new outputclass values are introduced.
